fn.p: Competing interest statement: D.M.M. is an inventor on a patent for H84T BanLec and the founder of the company Virule, which aims to commercialize H84T BanLec.
This article is a PNAS Direct Submission.
This article contains supporting information online at https://www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1915152117/-/DCSupplemental.
